forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 7C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 46F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable clouds early. Some decrease in clouds later in the day. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly clear during the evening followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies early will become overcast later during the night. Low 42F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High near 10C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy in the morning, then off and on rain showers during the afternoon hours. High 51F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 48F. Winds ESE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall possibly over one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 11C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 14C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 9C. Winds WSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with showers. Low 49F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few showers early with overcast skies later in the day. High 12C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then cloudy in the afternoon. High near 55F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 8C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. Low 48F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 12C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with some sunshine later in the day. High 54F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 7C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low around 45F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later in the day. High 12C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High near 55F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies. Low near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. High 54F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening becoming a steady light rain overnight. Low 8C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain late. Low 46F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the morning. Showers continuing in the afternoon. High 54F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional light rain. Low 7C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. Low around 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
